ï»¿A strategy that I use to keep me focused on goals is know the numbers.
What I mean by that is this: In business, you can have so many different goals, right?
You have qualitative goals, you have quantitative goals.
You have soft goals and hard goals and it can turn into just a morass of confusion.
But ultimately, numbers, numbers are the language of business.
So, if you wake up as CEO in the middle of the night,...
...he should be able to tell you growth rates and operating margin percentages...
...and EBITDAs and every KPI, key performance indicator.
If you don't know your numbers as a CEO, you might be in trouble.
